capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and I found out that he's a guy. I mean, it's pretty clear-cut, you know? He's definitely a male.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what is dudley?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Dudley's eyes look really blue today. I can tell he's feeling a bit down, his blue eyes seem to be the only thing that's bright about him right now.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what kind of personality does dudley have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Dudley's personality and it seems to me that he is indeed quite selfish.
